content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

`wrap_string("This is a test string.", 12)`

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width=10)
    # ...
end
```

### Examples

```julia-repl
julia> wrap_string("This is a test string.", 12)
"This is\na test \nstring."

julia> wrap_string("This is a test string.", text_width=3)
"Thi\nis\ais\ati\nsts\ntri\nnin\ng."
```
